short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A context menu that makes it easy to copy unicode faces to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that adds a context menu that allows you to select from various unicode faces to copy to the clipboard.

Source is available at https://github.com/solarnz/unicodefaces-context
